text: Polycera maculata is a species of sea slug, a nudibranch, a shell-less marine gastropod mollusc in the family Polyceridae.MolluscaBase (2018). Polycera maculata Pruvot-Fol, 1951. Accessed on 2018-09-12. == Distribution == This species was described from a single specimen dredged offshore of Marseille, Mediterranean Sea. ==References== Category:Polyceridae Category:Gastropods described in 1951
title: Polycera maculata
